longBusinessSummary.0: Galaxy Surfactants Limited manufactures and markets specialty chemicals for personal and home care industries in India and internationally. The company offers fatty alcohol surfactants, fatty alcohol ethoxylates, alkyl benzene sulphonic acids, foam and viscosity boosters, mild surfactants, pearlizers, surfactant blends, syndet and TBB, sunscreens, preservatives, and blends, as well as emollients, conditioning agents, hair color protector, scalp care, and anti-microbials. It serves the skin, hair, sun, oral, baby, and home care markets. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Navi Mumbai, India.
